alert.note: Alert for Ziebach (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 07 at 2:25PM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Ziebach County through 300 PM MDT... At 225 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 3 miles west of South Eagle Butte, or 4 miles southwest of Eagle Butte, moving south at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Intersection of Highway 63 and BIA Road 8 around 240 PM MDT. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
